headline: Don't Let Salt Snowball Into a Big Problem
summary: With winter underway and the possibility of snowstorms, New Jersey American Water and The Watershed Institute are reminding residents, businesses and municipalities that excessive use of road salt can have serious environmental consequences. While salt helps keep roads and sidewalks safe, its runoff can harm drinking water sources, aquatic ecosystems and infrastructure long after the snow has melted. headline: Iowa American Water Welcomes in the New Year with New Ways to Save
summary: Iowa American Water celebrates the new year and offers tips to save customers money, water and time, from their kitchen to their backyard, and ways to stay informed about their water and wastewater service all year long.

headline: American Water Welcomes in the New Year with New Ways to Save
summary: American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., celebrates the new year and offers tips to save customers money, water and time, from their kitchen to their backyard, as well as ways to stay informed about their water and wastewater service all year long.
